EmailTemplate.name: 17.IPRout.XLE.Health.N.G.N.18522.Healthcare nurture.Email 7
EmailTemplate.subject: Transforming healthcare IT with cloud and SDN
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Transforming healthcare IT with cloud and SDN With cloud being a critical element for IT in the digital transformation of the healthcare system, software-defined networking SDN grows in importance across the network. SDN supports cloud and provides an agile, flexible foundation for digital transformation.
As UPMC, a world-renowned healthcare provider, moved to a cloud IT model, they implemented server virtualization that resulted in network bottlenecks affecting responsiveness to applications and network performance.
Read our case study "UPMC boosts application deployment speed with SDN <[[https://pages.nokia.com/rs/937-WRZ-618/images/UPMC%20boosts%20virtualized%20application%20deployment%20speed%20with%20SDN.pdf]]>“ and learn how UPMC implemented SDN from Nokia’s Nuage Networks and resolved network bottlenecks and utilized existing network resources more efficiently. Sincerely,
Cindy Bergevin Head of Healthcare Marketing, Nokia Email: cindy.bergevin@nokia.com <[[mailto:cindy.bergevin@nokia.com]]> Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
